title: Fix service discovery test never running
description: Service discovery test shares timer with RPC test (last_peer_check). RPC runs every 15s but service discovery needs >= 20s, so the condition never triggers. Need separate timer variable.

title: Improve test_multi.lua reporting and visibility
description: Currently test_multi.lua runs many tests but only announces some of them. The RPC Test appears frequently but other tests (targeted pub/sub, call_service, deferred execution, error handling, etc.) run silently. Need to add clear announcements for all test executions so users can see what's being tested and when.
